message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.IR

The paper discusses attacks on smart lights that can be used to violate users' privacy and security. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). Additionally, the paper focuses on the multimedia-visualization functionality of smart lights, which suggests a human-computer interaction (cs.HC) aspect. The use of infrared capabilities to create a covert-channel also suggests a potential application in information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the need for new privacy protection mechanisms, which could fall under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CY) or security and privacy (cs.SI).
